sensory_systems.name: Advanced Thermal Imaging (Infrared)
sensory_systems.description: High-resolution thermal cameras integrated with AI-powered anomaly detection to monitor server temperatures, cooling system performance, and identify hotspots in real-time. Utilizes spectral analysis for precise identification of component degradation and potential failures.

specifications.resolution: 160x120 pixels minimum, aiming for 4K (384x288) or higher for detailed analysis
specifications.accuracy: ±0.5°C temperature deviation within a 1cm radius, <1% error in hotspot identification

sensory_systems.name: Vibration Monitoring Sensors (MEMS Accelerometers)
sensory_systems.description: Dense network of microelectromechanical system (MEMS) accelerometers placed strategically around servers to capture vibration patterns. Coupled with machine learning for predictive maintenance based on signature analysis.

sensory_systems.name: Power Consumption Monitoring (Smart Power Meters)
sensory_systems.description: Granular power monitoring systems that track individual server component power consumption in real-time.  Integration with load balancing algorithms.

sensory_systems.name: Audio Anomaly Detection
sensory_systems.description: Microphones deployed to detect unusual fan noises, disk access sounds, or other audio anomalies that may indicate hardware issues.

control_systems.name: Adaptive Robotic Arm Systems
control_systems.description: Deployable robotic arms equipped with force sensors and precision actuators for automated cable management, component swapping, and minor hardware adjustments.

control_systems.name: AI-Powered Load Balancing & Resource Allocation
control_systems.description: A sophisticated control system that utilizes real-time data from all sensors to dynamically adjust server workloads, cooling, and power distribution to optimize performance and minimize waste.

control_systems.name: Automated Fluid Management (Cooling Systems)
control_systems.description: Precision control systems for liquid cooling systems, adjusting flow rates and temperature targets based on sensor data.

mechanical_systems.name: Modular Server Chassis
mechanical_systems.description: Standardized, interchangeable server chassis modules designed for rapid deployment and component swapping. Incorporates automated locking mechanisms.

mechanical_systems.name: Micro-Robotic Component Handling
mechanical_systems.description: Small, precise robotic manipulators designed to handle individual server components during swapping and assembly/disassembly.

software_integration.name: Digital Twin Platform
software_integration.description: A virtual representation of the entire server provisioning infrastructure, continuously updated with real-time sensor data. Enables simulation, optimization, and predictive maintenance.

software_integration.name: AI-Powered Orchestration Engine
software_integration.description: A central control system that integrates all data streams and executes automated provisioning workflows based on pre-defined rules and AI-driven optimization.

software_integration.name: Blockchain-Based Provenance Tracking
software_integration.description: A system to track the lifecycle of each server component, ensuring authenticity and traceability.
